    • Method Detail

      • generateInitialLevels

        public void generateInitialLevels​(double pointsToNextLevel)
        This function creates the 10 levels that the game use
        Parameters:
        pointsToNextLevel - The points that the player need to go to the next level, it adds the acumulation of pointsToNextLevel Every time

      • addLootToALevel

        public java.lang.String addLootToALevel​(int levelPos,
                                        java.lang.String lootName,
                                        java.lang.String URL,
                                        double points,
                                        int ammountOfLoots)
        This function creates a Loot and then adds it to a level given by the user
        Parameters:
        levelPos - The level in which the user is going to add the loot
        lootName - The name that is going to have the loot
        URL - The URL corresponding to the image of the loot
        points - The points that the loot is going to give
        ammountOfLoots - The total of the same loot that is going to be added to the level
        Returns:
        a String with the result of adding each loot

      • addEnemyToALevel

        public java.lang.String addEnemyToALevel​(int levelPos,
                                         java.lang.String enemyName,
                                         java.lang.String type,
                                         double pointsGiven,
                                         double pointsTaken)
        This function creates an Enemy and then adds it to a level given by the user
        Parameters:
        levelPos - The level in which the user is going to add the enemy
        enemyName - The name that is going to have the enemy
        type - The type of the enemy given by a String from the user
        pointsGiven - The points the enemy gives once is defeated
        pointsTaken - The points the enemy takes if defeat the player
        Returns:
        a String confirming the operation

      • reportEnemiesAndLootsOfLevel

        public java.lang.String reportEnemiesAndLootsOfLevel​(int levelPos)
        This function returns a String from a selected position given by the user
        Parameters:
        levelPos - number of the level that the user wants to access
        Returns:
        A String with the information of the level

      • countLootAllLevels

        public java.lang.String countLootAllLevels​(java.lang.String lootName)
        This function counts all the loot that corresponds to the lootName given by the user in all levels
        Parameters:
        lootName - The name of the loot that is going to be counted
        Returns:
        A String with amount of a loot found in all levels

      • takeAllLootsName

        public void takeAllLootsName​(java.lang.String name)
        This function will use the name of the loots added as a key in a Hashmap then the value in eack key will be used as an acumulator
        Parameters:
        name - The name that will work as key

      • mostRepeatedLootAllLevels

        public java.lang.String mostRepeatedLootAllLevels()
        This function will iterate through the loot names and returns a message with the most repeated treasure through all levels
        Returns:
        A String with the most repeated treasure through all levels

      • takeAllEnemiesType

        public void takeAllEnemiesType​(java.lang.String type)
        This function takes a String that represents the enemy type from the enmy that was added to the game. Uses a HashMap to store the amount of an enemy type in the game
        Parameters:
        type - A String containing the enemy type that was added to a level

      • typeInAllLevels

        public java.lang.String typeInAllLevels​(java.lang.String type)
        This function will return a String with amount of an enemy type
        Parameters:
        type - The enemy type that is needed
        Returns:
        a String with the amount of that enemy type in all levels

      • addPlayer

        public java.lang.String addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname,
                                  java.lang.String name)
        This function adds a player to the game if the player nickname doesn't exists
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nickname and identifier of the player that is going to be added
        name - name of the player that is going to be added
        Returns:
        String validating the operation

      • getLevelOfPlayer

        public int getLevelOfPlayer​(java.lang.String playerNickName)
        Returns the position of the level where is positionated the player
        Parameters:
        playerNickName - Identifier of the player
        Returns:
        -1 if the player is not found, otherwise will return the level of the player

      • clasificatePlayerAccordingToScore

        public boolean clasificatePlayerAccordingToScore​(Player player)
        This function will clasificate a player according to his score
        Parameters:
        player - the player object
        Returns:
        A boolean confirming the operation

      • increaseLevelOfPlayer

        public java.lang.String increaseLevelOfPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname,
                                              double pointsGiven)
        This function will increase the level of a player, if the player score is bigger than the score needed to go to the next level, the player will be put in that level otherwise, will show the score needed to go to the next level
        Parameters:
        nickname - Nickname of the player that is going to change its level
        pointsGiven - The amount of score that is going to be added
        Returns:
        A String with the new level of the player with the score needed to go to the next level

      • reportTheEnemyWithHighestScore

        public java.lang.String reportTheEnemyWithHighestScore()
        This function returns a String with the enemy with that takes more score
        Returns:
        String with the enemy with the highest score with the level it is located

      • playersWithHighestScore

        public java.lang.String playersWithHighestScore()
        This function returns a String with the top 5 best players
        Returns:
        String with the top 5 players in a no specific order

      • consonantsEnemyName

        public java.lang.String consonantsEnemyName​(java.lang.String enemyName)
        This function receives a String and returns the number of consonants in it
        Parameters:
        enemyName - A String given by the user
        Returns:
        A String with the amount of consonants
